function.description: Compiles regex pattern and indexes it.
function.prototype: <enum E> public boolean regexCompile(rstring pattern, E patternIndex)

function.description: Compiles regex pattern and indexes it, additionally allows to control max memory allocated.
function.prototype: <enum E> public boolean regexCompile(rstring pattern, E patternIndex, int32 maxmem)

function.description: Compiles regex pattern and indexes it - static version
function.prototype: <enum E> public boolean regexCompileStatic(rstring pattern, E patternIndex)

function.description: Compiles regex pattern and indexes it - static version, additionally allows to control max memory allocated.
function.prototype: <enum E> public boolean regexCompileStatic(rstring pattern, E patternIndex, int32 maxmem)

function.description: Tries to match the whole string with the pattern - doesn't use compiled regex.
function.prototype: public boolean regexFullMatch(rstring str, rstring pattern)

function.description: Tries to match the whole string with the pattern - uses compiled regex by it's index.
function.prototype: <enum E> public boolean regexFullMatch(rstring str, E patternIndex)

function.description: Tries to match the whole string with the pattern - static version, uses compiled regex by it's index.
function.prototype: <enum E> public boolean regexFullMatchStatic(rstring str, E patternIndex)

function.description: Tries to match the string with the pattern - doesn't use compiled regex.
function.prototype: public boolean regexPartialMatch(rstring str, rstring pattern)

function.description: Tries to match the string with the pattern - uses compiled regex by it's index.
function.prototype: <enum E> public boolean regexPartialMatch(rstring str, E patternIndex)

function.description: Tries to match the string with the pattern - static version, uses compiled regex by it's index.
function.prototype: <enum E> public boolean regexPartialMatchStatic(rstring str, E patternIndex)
